Updated: June 11, 2025 @ 4:52 pm Full Forecast **Page Reprints: Marshall Championship Reprints** Jun 17, 2018 Jun 17, 2018UpdatedMar 12, 2024 Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save Herald-Dispatch pages from various Marshall championships and bowl wins. Professionally framed prints are $140, and unframed prints are $25. If you are in a rush, our office at 5192 Braley Road in Huntington keeps some framed reprints in stock, as well as the Marshall University Bookstore on campus. To inquire what reprints are available, please call our office at 304-526-4468 during regular business hours. Prints currently available include the 2022 upset of Notre Dame, 2020-21 NCAA College Cup Soccer, 2019 CIT Victory/Jon Elmore Reprint, 2018 Bad Boy Mowers Gasparilla Bowl, 2018 1st Round men's basketball win at NCAA tourney, 2018 Men's Basketball C-USA Championship, 2015 St. Petersburg Bowl, 2014 Boca Raton Bowl, 2014 C-USA Championship, 2013 Military Bowl, 2009 Little Caesars Pizza Bowl, 2002 GMAC Bowl, 2002 MAC Championship, 2001 GMAC Bowl, 2000 Motor City Bowl, 2000 MAC Championship, 1999 Motor City Bowl, 1999 MAC Championship, 1999 Perfect Season, 1998 Motor City Bowl, 1998 MAC Championship, 1997 MAC Championship, 1996 NCAA Division I-AA extra, 1996 NCAA Division I-AA and 1992 NCAA Division I-AA. Page 1B March 11, 2024 -- Marshall Women SBC Champs.
